body: Hi Ji, There is an input that lets you control the self-obstruction of your geometry. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a4JBf1Z8ExZLed6op6K0-au633Rg*LWYFgD-K1Ug7b3oU4Cddby-crcf5MgDjPjE805aqDKwa5*xkqOqsEj3n0Uk-X0kC-1L/geometryBlocksView_FALSE.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a4JBf1Z8ExZKTMoemiLxBWpr66aDjUbPN*GvBBUqj3aWC7aFiHl9LAAge2mEhCNfrWHjS93dCIvHY1r2pSGHxxioudReZazk/geometryBlocksView_TRUE.png) For more information, take a look at this short discussion: [geometryBlocksView_](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/view-analysis-component-on-ladybug) Best Antonello
